alert.note: Alert for Cobb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 29 at 11:49PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Allatoona Creek at Stilesboro Road near Acworth affecting Cobb County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Allatoona Creek at Stilesboro Road near Acworth. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and fields near the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on Stilesboro Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:15 PM EDT Tuesday was 13.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.3 feet on 05/05/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon at 1200 PM EDT.
